The Cronulla playmaker could see the funny side of the shot he received post-match, revealing his former Penrith teammate actually apologised moments after folding the 29-year-old in half.

articles.title: Liverpool's Premier League draw with Everton in Merseyside derby means longer wait for first league title since 1990 - ABC News
articles.description: Liverpool will likely have to wait a bit longer to claim the Premier League after a 0-0 draw in which it came within centimetres of losing to Merseyside rivals Everton in their first game back since the coronavirus shutdown.
articles.content:
Liverpool could not have clinched the Premier League title in the derby against Everton, and played like it held to a 0-0 draw that almost ended in defeat.

articles.title: Super Rugby Aotearoa: Scott Barrett could be set to miss season - New Zealand Herald
articles.description: Scott Barrett faces missing the entire Super Rugby Aotearoa season.
articles.content:
Crusaders captain Scott Barrett faces missing the entire Super Rugby Aotearoa season due to a foot injury.
